# ILogger.Info method

Shows info message for all registered loggers.

```csharp
public void Info(string message, [CallerFilePath] string filePath = "", 
    [CallerMemberName] string memberName = "", [CallerLineNumber] int lineNumber = 0)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| message | Message to show |
| filePath | File path of caller |
| memberName | Member name of caller |
| lineNumber | Line number of caller |
